author: @kmfsousa
text: Worked perfectly for me. Thanks! Only different thing I had to do was specify the path the setup.py and not include python ex: C:\PATH\setup.py py2exe  Also, a helpful tip you can shift right click on a file and "open command window here" instead of having to navigate to it in cmd :)
